185958105.review:
Why It’s a Great Game:

1. Unique Gameplay:
   - The core gameplay revolves around exploring the open world, capturing slimes using your trusty "vacpack," and managing your ranch by feeding slimes, collecting their "plorts" (valuable resources), and selling them for profit.
   - Different slimes have unique behaviors, diets, and needs, adding a layer of strategy to ranch management.

2. Charming Visuals:
   - The game’s vibrant and colorful art style is eye-catching and adds to its lighthearted charm.
   - Each slime type is uniquely designed, from cheerful Pink Slimes to glowing Phosphor Slimes and explosive Boom Slimes.

3. Relaxing Yet Engaging:
   - Slime Rancher strikes a perfect balance between being relaxing and keeping you engaged with its resource management, exploration, and light puzzle-solving.
   - There's no "game over" state, making it a stress-free experience.

4. Exploration and Secrets:
   - The Far, Far Range is filled with beautiful biomes, hidden treasure pods, and mysterious slimes to discover.
   - Players can unlock upgrades for their vacpack and jetpack to access new areas and secrets.

5. Creative Freedom:
   - Build and customize your ranch as you see fit. You can mix slimes to create hybrids (Largos) or experiment with different setups to maximize efficiency.

6. Regular Updates and Sequel:
   - The developers have supported the game with updates over time, and the sequel, *Slime Rancher 2*, brings even more to the table for fans of the original.


Who Will Enjoy Slime Rancher?
This game is perfect for players who enjoy relaxing, creative experiences with a dash of exploration and adventure. Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a chill experience or a fan of farming sims, *Slime Rancher* is a fantastic choice.


Verdict:
With its charming visuals, engaging gameplay, and delightful atmosphere, *Slime Rancher* is a standout indie gem on Steam. It’s a game that appeals to both kids and adults, offering hours of fun and creativity. Highly recommended for anyone looking to escape into a whimsical world filled with adorable slimes!

185914892.review:
[귀여운 슬라임만 있고 제대로 된게 아무것도 없는 실망 그 자체인 게임]

맵) 조작법만 대충알려주고 "자! 어서 모험을 떠나요!"식으로 게임이 시작하는데 정작 "모험"과 관련된 요소는 하나같이 처참하다.
이 게임의 맵은 그냥 백화점이랑 다를 거 없이 어느 구역에 가서 자기가 원하는 슬라임을 뽑아가는 형식이며
길은 쓸데없이 나뉘어져 있고 정작 가봤자 아무것도 없거나 수집요소인 포드, 
그리고 쓸데 없는 아이템 상자만 줘서 탐험의 재미가 존재하지 않는다. 
심지어 한 맵에는 퍼즐이랍시고 그냥 문만 켰다가 껐다하는 게 있었는데 굉장히 실망스러웠다.

편의성) 그럼 적어도 지도라도 제대로 되어있을까?
안타깝게도 미니맵도 없는 와중에 지도에 중요한 것을 표시조차 할 수 없어 가시성이 떨어진다.
차라리 지도에 표시 되었던 나침반을 인게임 화면에 진짜 나침반 형식으로 했으면 적어도 플레이어 자신이 어느 방향에 가야하는지, 어느 방향으로 가고있는지 알 수 있었을텐데... 넓은 맵에 비해 플레이어 이동방식이 너무 답답한 것도 한몫한다.

농장) 문제는 메인 요소인 슬라임 농장도 문제가 있다는 것. 
시세 시스템때문에 슬라임을 계속해서 바꾸어야 하는데 이것 때문에 가축을 기르는 농장보다는 기계부품을 교체하는 로봇이 되는 것 같았다. 더욱 심한 건 이게 끝이여서 게임이 매우 빠르게 질린다.

스토리) 내가 살다살다 이렇게 형편없는 엔딩과 스토리는 처음본다. 케이신가 뭐시기에게 메세지 몇장 받고 그냥 엔딩이 나오는데 이 게임은 스토리보다는 게임플레이가 중요해서 텍스트로만 때우는게 그렇다쳐도 엔딩 타이밍이 참;; 
차라리 유리 사막 정화한 뒤 농장으로 돌아가면 컷신으로 넘어가서 케이시의 새 메세지 내용 보여주고 엔딩보여주면 딱 깔끔할텐데

결론) 슬라임빨

185892762.review:
Slime Rancher — это просто глоток свежего воздуха в мире игр! Я в полном восторге от этого милого и расслабляющего приключения на далекой планете. Вот почему она мне так понравилась:

•  Очаровательный мир: Графика в Slime Rancher невероятно яркая и красочная, а сами слаймы – просто очаровашки! Каждый вид слайма имеет свою уникальную внешность и характер, и наблюдать за их поведением одно удовольствие. 
•  Умиротворяющий геймплей: В отличие от многих других игр, здесь нет постоянной гонки за выживание или напряжения. Slime Rancher предлагает спокойный и медитативный геймплей, где можно исследовать мир, собирать слаймов, строить ранчо и экспериментировать с разными видами.
•  Разнообразие задач: Хоть игра и кажется простой на первый взгляд, на самом деле она предлагает массу возможностей для развития. Нужно грамотно управлять своим ранчо, следить за слаймами, изучать новые виды и открывать секреты планеты.
•  Креативный процесс: Строительство ранчо, разведение слаймов и эксперименты с питанием дают простор для творчества. Можно создать уникальное ранчо с любимыми слаймами и построить его так, как тебе нравится.
•  Отсутствие насилия: Slime Rancher — это идеальная игра для тех, кто устал от насилия и хочет просто отдохнуть и расслабиться. Здесь нет сражений и убийств, а есть только милые слаймы и увлекательное приключение.
•  Подходит для всех возрастов: Это отличная игра для всей семьи. Она достаточно проста для детей, но при этом интересна и взрослым.

В общем, Slime Rancher — это одна из тех игр, которые дарят положительные эмоции и заставляют улыбаться. Если вы ищете что-то расслабляющее, милое и увлекательное, то эта игра точно для вас! Рекомендую всем попробовать. 10 из 10!

185853275.review:
Slime Rancher Хорошая или Плохая Игра?
Slime Rancher — это игра, которая предлагает уникальное сочетание симулятора фермы, исследования и управления ресурсами. Но стоит ли она вашего времени? Давайте разберемся.

Что в игре хорошего?
Очаровательные слаймы. Визуальный стиль игры яркий, милый и буквально наполнен позитивом. Слаймы — это главная «изюминка» игры, и за ними приятно наблюдать.
Увлекательный геймплей. Поиск новых видов слаймов, улучшение ранчо и исследование мира создают увлекательный игровой процесс.
Расслабляющая атмосфера. Игра идеально подходит для тех, кто хочет отдохнуть без напряжения.
Для всех возрастов. Простота управления делает игру доступной как для детей, так и для взрослых.
Что в игре плохого?
Повторяемость. После нескольких часов игры действия начинают повторяться, что может наскучить.
Минимум сюжета. Если вам важна история, то Slime Rancher может разочаровать.
Нет мультиплеера. Играть можно только в одиночку, что ограничивает взаимодействие.
Иногда ощущается пустота. Большие карты не всегда наполнены событиями.
Хорошая или плохая игра?
Slime Rancher — хорошая игра, особенно если вы любите расслабляющий и яркий геймплей. Она отлично подойдет для тех, кто ищет легкое приключение и не стремится к глубокому сюжету или интенсивным механикам. Однако для игроков, которым быстро становится скучно от однотипных задач, она может показаться посредственной.

Оценка: 8/10
Игра хорошая, но не для всех. Если вы хотите что-то милое и ненапряжное, попробуйте. Если же вы ищете сложность или интенсивность, возможно, стоит поискать что-то другое.

A very open game, emphasis on the Rancher part, as you'll need to do a lot of strategic farming to earn and a lot of venturing about to store food that spawns around the map, I would definitely recommend getting upgrades, and make gordo slimes of anything but the pink slimes, as either way, you'll get a lot of their plots as you explore. The story is great, the music is relaxing, and most of all, if you already see a gordo slime in the wild, DO NOT LET IT GET ANY OTHER PLORT IN ITS GOBBLING MOUTH, THOSE TARRS ARE UNFORGIVING AND WILL WREAK HAVOC IN YOUR FARM OR IN THE WILD! Seriously, as cute as these little buggers may be, have a variety of them in the same place and be prepared for disaster, make sure to have that water tank full
Ahem- Or you know, play on the easier difficulty without them, but where's the fun in that xD 
Definitely recommended if you like a cute and chaotic game like this, but also relaxing most of the time if you know what you're doing. If only they had some sort of multiplayer mode, it would definitely be so much better with friends. 10/10, would touch a rock slime again.

185771303.review:
[b] 名称：史莱姆牧场 [/b]

[i] 《史莱姆牧场》是一款科幻题材模拟经营游戏，罕见的“养殖史莱姆”题材玩法赋予该作堪称冠绝市面的Q萌体验，游戏主打轻松休闲，是任何猛男们都不应拒绝的经典作品。[/i]

[h1] 猛男之选(｢･ω･)｢ [/h1]

你来到『致远牧星』开设牧场、养殖史莱姆
(づ ●─● )づ
游戏玩法非常简单，几乎所有交互都是通过自带的传送枪吸入和喷射物品完成
(づ ●─● )づ
游戏中玩家要收集史莱姆，然后种植食物喂养，使其产出[strike]便便[/strike]结晶，售卖金币升级农场或作为资源发展科技
(づ ●─● )づ

游戏中不同种类的史莱姆有不同的习性，且两种史莱姆之间可以组合杂交，但游戏最大的卖点，还是这些在地上啪叽啪叽蹦哒的小家伙们实在萌翻辣
～(￣▽￣～)~
本作中也存在少量战斗元素，但无论是养殖还是战斗，其难度判定都极为宽松，几乎不存在失败的可能，是纯纯的休闲向定位
～(￣▽￣～)~
传送枪吸入喷出时果冻般的特效和音效，为游戏带来一种奇妙的解压感，一上手就非常上头，算是有一定魔性
～(￣▽￣～)~

作为模拟经营方面的经营的可玩性，只能算是“过得去”
(눈_눈)
牧场的建筑种类和升级选项都很稀少，连建造地点也是固定的，外观存在可自定义元素但非常有限
(눈_눈)
游戏中满打满算共24种史莱姆，常见的也就一半，所谓“杂交”也仅仅是外观和特性的简单叠加
(눈_눈)
中期会解锁科技，但实用的并不多，这款游戏后期的主要目标就是收集资源，在牧场中建立多个无人机站点，实现简单的史莱姆自动化喂养
(눈_눈)
一套流程下来，大概30小时左右，就没有后期可玩内容了
(눈_눈)

相较于模拟经营部分，《史莱姆牧场》在探索玩法方面倒是下了不少功夫，流程中，玩家走出牧场冒险的时间要多过宅家种田
✪ω✪
除了牧场区域外，玩家可以随着流程推进逐步深入几张不同区域的箱庭地图
✪ω✪
不同区域间风格地貌差异鲜明，中后期不同区域还有不同玩法主题，缺点就是数量尚显不足
(⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄)
地图面积说大不大，说小也不小，区域之间还有一些捷径相互联通，由于游戏中玩家具备短途飞行能力，游戏中各种想不到的犄角旮旯藏有许多『宝藏球』收集品，加上游戏病不严格限制玩家的探索顺序，在流程中甚至会给到一种在玩类魂游戏的感觉
✪ω✪
当然，场景整体设计水平自然无法媲美《黑魂》系列，部分场景识别度不是很高，路线设计非常绕，尽管游戏提供了简单的平面地图，但对路痴依然极不友好。
(๑˙ー˙๑)
此外，出于对自由探索的鼓励，本作的教学引导并不详尽，路痴+不擅长自我设定目标的玩家可能会遭遇手足无措的茫然感
(๑˙ー˙๑)
也就是说，别看这游戏外表蠢萌蠢萌哒，但如果是游戏菜鸟型的萌妹子真就容易玩不明白
(๑˙ー˙๑)

所以个人认为《史莱姆牧场》的受众定位其实很窄，它的最佳效用应该就是给那些在其他世界中经历无数厮杀磨练的猛男们，在身心疲惫之时来上一次柔软放松的心灵马杀鸡
(ง •̀_•́)ง

185633271.review:
Amazing game with a very very very simple yet realistic, mature, beautiful and relatable story with a great message. I highly recommend paying attention to it by reading Casey's letters and the messages left by Hobert. 

It's worth playing, it feels nice to see the ranch grow, discover new slimes and enjoy the comfy vibes. The slimes' designs are really cool and cute and it's a beautiful game, the graphics, scenery designs and elements, slimes are very visually pleasing.

The soundtrack is gorgeous (gahhhh Indigo Quarry Night and 1000 Light Years Away...... 🥺)

Even though it's an easy and satisfying game it can still be a bit stressful at times.

My negative complaints are that It takes a long time to unlock the automation system, which isn't even 100% automatic. If you don't know how to get it by seeing it on videos or posts you're probably only going to find out a few hours before stop playing. Same goes for portals and walking, you need to walk way too much and only unlock the resources to fast travel in the late game, when you're almost done with the game.

Right after finishing adventure mode or getting all the achievements you're most likely going to stop playing and feeling burnt out. It shoudn't seem like a problem, I mean, of course you're going to stop playing after finishing the game but I think it should be more like a "I am satisfied" than "I am tired" feeling. Honestly, I blame most of this in the issues I mentioned before, Not every farm game needs to be automatable but in a game like Slime Rancher, where you need to manage eight areas that are relatively far from each other, this ends up being a necessity, it can be suffocating at times and the walking thing gets tiring after a while too.

Having more cool customization and decoration options would be nice, since you could focus more in the aesthetic part of the ranch after finishing the game. Btw I don't really like how the ranch looks, specifically the slime corral. Idk it just doesn't look comfortable for the slimes, I feel bad for putting them in such confined spaces.

Despite my complaints I still love this game and am very grateful for the experience and knowledge I got from it. Thanks Monomi Park, it was a really fun and nostalgic experience. I'll always love these little creatures and I'm looking forward to play Slime Rancher 2.

185625124.review:
JOGO

  Um jogo relaxante e calmo para amantes de jogos casuais, o jogo consegue ser viciante do inicio ao fim com muita paz e diversão, a história muito legal tanto do Sr. H, quanto dos personagens que conhecemos ao longo de jornada, a gameplay é tranquila e divertida, o mapa é gigantesco e com ambientes magníficos e um level design muito bem feito, uma grande variedade de slimes e biomas que melhoram a experiência do jogador, apesar da história não intrusiva o jogo consegue te fazer ir atrás das notas para entender melhor sobre o jogo.


PLATINA

  Uma platina divertida com algumas dificuldades e até um pouquinho cansativa, a maioria das conquistas são fáceis e tranquilas, algumas são chatinhas pois você precisa avançar no mapa e farmar dinheiro e recursos mas que no final vale apena, o modo "Rush" é bem complexo e requer conhecimento e algumas tentativas para obter a ultima conquista mas que no final é bom satisfatório.

 Um jogo que eu sempre quis jogar desde 2013 e finalmente tive a oportunidade de jogar e platinar, eu amo este jogo e o coloco no meu top 10 jogos, recomendo a compra e eu certamente jogarei novamente.

Slime Rancher, игра про ферму на далёкой планете...

В целом, даже не смотря на эти минусы Slime Rancher отличная игра - ферма, которая точно затянет вас как минимум, на пару вечеров.

185469765.review:
Симулятор колониалиста

Давным давно увидел демо этой игры, посмотрел геймплей и забыл про неё, хоть она мне и понравилась. Вот поиграл, полностью прошел, почти все достижения получил и xepeю на сколько она классная. 
Сочитать слаймов, кормить их, делать авто ферму, искать ресурсы и путешествовать в этой игре достаточно, но ТОЧНО не кол-во ячеек для предметов. Четыре КАРЛ! Четыре! Очень больная тема игры, как и нудный бэк-трекинг. Но это не страшно, ведь эти минусы перекрывают плюсы. 
Приятный визуальный стиль, хорошая музыка (хоть её немного) и сам основной геймплей (не считая верхние два пункта).

Всем советую поиграть, и успокоить душу в этой замечательной игре.
7.5/10

我先说购买建议，有优惠可以直接入手，没有优惠不建议拿，除非真的很喜欢等不及，还有这是个单人游戏，没法联机。

整个游戏主要是在一张地图内跟史莱姆的互动，喜欢农资源的，喜欢探地形的，喜欢解密的，还是单纯喜欢史莱姆的，都有东西可以玩，就算其中不玩也不会相互影响其他的体验，可玩性来说是没问题的很棒，我目前完了10多小时地图也还没探索完。

游戏内自带图鉴，简单容易懂，整体也不会玩到很机械，我认为在2025年头2为止这都是一款不错的休闲游戏。

185350366.review:
Análise de Slime Rancher

Slime Rancher é um jogo que combina elementos de exploração, simulação e gerenciamento de recursos em um universo colorido e cativante. Desenvolvido pela Monomi Park, ele coloca os jogadores no papel de Beatrix LeBeau, uma jovem que se muda para um planeta distante para cuidar de um rancho de slimes. Com sua atmosfera relaxante e mecânicas envolventes, o jogo é uma experiência única, mas não isenta de algumas limitações.

Prós
Estética Vibrante e Encantadora
O visual de Slime Rancher é um dos seus maiores atrativos. Os cenários são coloridos e os slimes têm designs adoráveis, o que torna o jogo visualmente agradável e divertido de explorar.

Jogabilidade Relaxante
O ciclo de coleta, alimentação e gerenciamento de slimes é simples, mas viciante. Para quem procura uma experiência tranquila e descomplicada, o jogo é perfeito.

Exploração Bem Elaborada
O mundo de Slime Rancher é surpreendentemente vasto e oferece diferentes biomas para descobrir. Cada área apresenta novos tipos de slimes, recursos e segredos que incentivam o jogador a continuar explorando.

Mecânicas de Progressão
A progressão é satisfatória, com upgrades que facilitam a coleta de recursos, novos equipamentos e melhorias para o rancho. Isso mantém o jogador engajado por muitas horas.

Público Amplo
Slime Rancher é acessível a jogadores de todas as idades, graças à sua dificuldade moderada e à ausência de elementos violentos ou estressantes.

Contras
Falta de Profundidade no Fim do Jogo
Após explorar todas as áreas e desbloquear as melhorias principais, o jogo pode se tornar repetitivo. A falta de objetivos mais avançados ou desafiadores deixa o final menos envolvente.

História Simples e Pouco Explorada
Embora tenha um pano de fundo interessante, Slime Rancher não dá grande foco à narrativa, o que pode desagradar jogadores que buscam uma história mais rica.

Gestão do Rancho Pode Ser Monótona
Em certos momentos, cuidar do rancho pode parecer uma tarefa repetitiva, especialmente quando as rotinas de coleta e alimentação se tornam mecânicas demais.

Desempenho e Pequenos Bugs
Embora geralmente bem otimizado, o jogo pode apresentar quedas de desempenho em áreas mais densas ou ao interagir com um grande número de slimes. Pequenos bugs também podem surgir, embora não sejam frequentes.

Ausência de Multiplayer
Para um jogo tão acolhedor e criativo, a falta de um modo cooperativo é uma oportunidade perdida. Jogar com amigos poderia aumentar significativamente a longevidade e o apelo do título.

Conclusão
Slime Rancher é uma experiência única e relaxante, perfeita para quem busca um jogo leve e encantador. Sua combinação de exploração, gerenciamento e estética cativante cria um jogo memorável, mesmo que tenha limitações em termos de profundidade e desafios no final. Apesar dos contras, o charme do jogo é inegável, e ele vale a pena para quem quer se aventurar em um universo repleto de slimes fofos e coloridos.

Nota Final: 8/10

185229497.review:
[h1] 7/10优秀可爱的小众冒险经营类游戏 [/h1]

[h2] 优点 [/h2]
+++++可爱的画风、史莱姆和人物角色形象
+++++多样的史莱姆、史莱姆特性、资源
+++++经营类养成玩法，非常对我胃口
++++人物、牧场、技能等可以升级，有养成的元素，有成就感
++++地图风格很棒，每个地图各有特色
++++地图设计非常巧妙
游戏地图不是2D的，而是3D的，如同迷宫一般，蜿蜒曲折，地图利用率很高，让地图的反复探索价值提升
++BGM很梦幻和可爱，风格我很喜欢，甚至有早晚的时间段变化
+ 3个其他牧场主的有趣小游戏

[h2] 缺点 [/h2]
[u] (我是一个对缺点和负反馈较敏感的人，可以当我比较记仇hhhh，虽然我缺点这一栏写得很长，但并不影响我对这个游戏的喜爱和评价，7/10有它的理由，而我的主观观点仅供参考) [/u]

-----没有全自动化
即使玩到后期，依然是半自动管理，机器小蜜蜂不是很智能且功能单一，有很多工作依然需要手动完成。

-----后期游戏的重要资源产出不合理
很多非常实用的建筑动不动就是要一个蜂王浆，但蜂王浆的产出率极低，我62天了也才见过5个蜂王浆，而精炼炉又在和高级机器人一起抢我的蜂王浆，导致农场半自动化的进程极其缓慢。

-----后期游戏的资源管理崩坏
在中后期，钱已经变成了一个数字，失去了前期赚钱、探险、省钱攒一个大牧场的刺激感和新鲜感，每天起床就是吸结晶，然后进账个几万，但却没处花。

每日任务、很多藏宝球或是什么金库，到了后期很明显跟不上数值膨胀。每日任务一次就给个300-1000金币之间的物资，而我就算原地站着不动吸吸结晶都已经大几千甚至上W的钱了。藏宝球也是一样，我钻机钻个10分钟出的东西比资源藏宝球还要多个两倍。金库，我最后找到金库时看着满地的黄金结晶心中早已毫无波澜，没钱的时候没见给我钱，有钱的时候你再来给我钱，就失去了意义，捡那一两百个黄金还没给我一个好康的装饰品来得有意义。

-----重复且枯燥的上班坐牢小游戏
这点是我对这个游戏最大的不满，没有之一，3个牧场主需要你玩他们的小游戏到最后才能获得他们的牧场扩展区域，而这3个小游戏一开始还算好玩，玩个两三遍后开始变得枯燥乏味，然而他们对小游戏的产生的资源的要求还格外的高，动不动就是要你打个七八把才能进入下个阶段，玩到最后完全变成了加班坐牢，脑子已经死了，只剩手还在做简单的重复劳动。

----有效建筑少
有些建筑非常鸡肋，比如回血站、传送站（只能传送一个物品，而且小蜜蜂还不能使用，那有啥用啊）、喷水站等

----有些地图有效利用率太低
比如两个隐藏岛，甚至没有独特的史莱姆，就几个大型史莱姆和藏宝球糊弄你，拿完就走了再也不会来，也没有探索欲望。这其实算是个机制问题，因为游戏没有对你有史莱姆的捕捉数量有要求，导致大家伙都是拿到一个稀有史莱姆结晶后就开始杂交、就能产出，这个稀有结晶就不缺了。倒不如改成要吸50个XX史莱姆才能获得时装、建筑等，这样至少玩家有探索欲望，而不是拿到一个结晶后像中大奖一样回家杂交然后睡大觉等产出。

---简短（或是敷衍？）的剧情
剧情短到离谱，甚至我一句话就可以给你剧透完：[spoiler]来自地球的女同离开了她的女朋友到了一个外星买了一个二手牧场，在探索牧场的过程中通过前牧场主人留下的字条明白了他离开的理由和目的地[/spoiler]，结束。是的，游戏介绍剧情的方式除了看邮件和看前牧场主的字条就没了，没了。我在第30天左右steam弹了成就显示我剧情收集完了的时候我是懵逼的。

---有些细节缺乏打磨，对游戏体验造成的影响较大
简洁地说下几个影响比较大的吧，比如吸物品和丢物品的速度无法提升，枯燥且乏味，且占据了游戏时长的很大一部分，完全可以改进的。牧场扩展区域之间的连接道太长，而传送门又有限制导致在农场中跑图的时间过长，容易无聊。

---地图基本没用，无法标记的地图代表着除了查看自己的位置以外毫无用处。更别说一些隐藏地图连地图都看不了

185140321.review:
I got this game as a Christmas gift. The slimes are all super cute, the largo combinations are really cool, there's plenty to explore early to mid game and ranching in the late game is very satisfying if you like watching numbers go up or decorating your ranch. The soundtrack is pretty relaxing overall, but does get slightly tense when tarr slimes spawn. I really love the color scheme for the whole game and the graphics are stylized in a way that ages well.

The three different game modes provide a lot of options for how you want to play. I'll be doing an adventure mode game soon so that I can just think about making my farm pretty and not having to worry about tarr slime (which are very easy to deal with, but annoying sometimes). I was worried about the speedrunning/challenge mode, but rush is a shockingly fun experience that taught me a lot about how to play the game that I didn't know before.

For achievements there are only a handful that you need to go out of your way to get or grind for. In general, most of the achievements can be unlocked from just enjoying the game. It took me 54 hours to complete the entire game, but that's at an extremely leisurely pace where I spent a lot of time decorating my ranch.

10/10 from me

Slime Rancher is a delightful and relaxing game that’s perfect for unwinding. You play as a rancher collecting cute slimes, feeding them, and harvesting resources to expand your farm. The world is colorful, peaceful, and full of surprises.

The gameplay is simple yet addictive—there’s always something to do, whether it’s exploring new areas, discovering new slimes, or upgrading your ranch. It’s easy to get lost in the charming world and forget the time.

The game has a great balance of fun and progression, and the lighthearted atmosphere makes it enjoyable for players of all ages. If you’re looking for a stress-free, creative experience, Slime Rancher is a perfect choice.

I think it could be cozy and relaxing while offering some complexity.

185035283.review:
Slime Rancher é uma surpresa de jogo. Sempre via esse jogo e não dava muita coisa para ele, achava que não era para mim ou que fosse completamente bobo, porém depois de jogar é perceptível que o bobo era eu! Hahahaha

Slime Rancher é um jogo onde você vai para um planeta criar slimes para enriquecer vendendo as "fezes" dos bichinhos. Em uma primeira olhada parece um jogo sem muita personalidade e que propõem algo não muito divertido, mas quando você começa a explorar os biomas e encontrar segredos, logs do antigo morador contado sua história que se relaciona com a história da personagem que jogamos, NPCs que dão quests e tudo mais, você entende que esse foi um jogo feito com muito carinho e zelo, que possui sua narrativa escondida nas nuances dos detalhes!

Sobre a gameplay, ela pode ser tanto calmante quanto estressante, já que o jogo se molda as passadas do jogador. Como é um jogo que recompensa por explorar, ele tem alguns bugs que incomodam, como a personagem ficar presa entre dois objetos e precisar "se matar" para começar o próximo dia. Isso deve ter acontecido umas 3 vezes em toda a minha gameplay, não é destruidor da experiencia, mas me deixou bem **** por perder os itens que estava carregando.

Em suma, Slime Rancher é um jogo para todos, desde crianças até jogadores mais experientes. Não percam a oportunidade de jogar ele e se estiver em uma promoção então, nem pense, só compre!

The gameplay is genuinely just gather food to feed slime to upgrade pens/upgrade food production. Sure there is exploration but the exploration mediocre. 

I thought that the game would have much more incremental gameplay, but playing it I didn't see much QOL upgrades you can make. I then watched a playthrough and saw that the gameplay loop does not change at all really. 

Its a cute game and fun to watch other people play it, but actually playing yourself is not stimulating enough. The biggest choice you make in the game is "Which hybrid slime do I want to make?" 

There is just not enough dopamine hits/enjoyment factor to the game.

184964971.review:
Crítica para Slime Rancher
Puntuación: ★★★★★ (5/5)

Reseña:

Slime Rancher es un juego absolutamente encantador que ofrece una experiencia única y refrescante en el género de simulación y aventura. La premisa del juego es simple pero tremendamente adictiva: explorar un mundo colorido y recolectar adorables slimes para tu rancho. Los gráficos son vibrantes y llenos de vida, creando un ambiente acogedor y relajante que te invita a perderte en él durante horas.

La jugabilidad es intuitiva y accesible, perfecta para jugadores de todas las edades. Cada tipo de slime tiene características únicas, lo que añade una capa de estrategia a la gestión de tu rancho. La combinación de exploración, recolección y cuidado de los slimes es satisfactoria y siempre hay algo nuevo por descubrir.

La historia, aunque no es el foco principal del juego, está bien elaborada y añade profundidad a la experiencia. Los personajes y las notas que encuentras a lo largo del juego te sumergen en el universo de Slime Rancher de una manera encantadora. La banda sonora es igualmente fantástica, con melodías relajantes que complementan perfectamente el tono alegre y despreocupado del juego.

En resumen, Slime Rancher es un título imprescindible para cualquiera que busque un juego relajante y encantador. Su combinación de jugabilidad adictiva, gráficos hermosos y una atmósfera alegre lo convierten en un clásico moderno. Altamente recomendado para jugadores de todas las edades.

184941874.review:
Slime Rancher: Слаймы, плорты и щепотка космического безумия

На далекой планете «Беспредельное Запределье» отважная фермерша Беатрикс ЛёБо решила превратить милых слаймов в свой основной источник дохода. Игра сочетает в себе яркий мир, забавных обитателей и необычный бизнес – продажу плортов, которые слаймы оставляют после кормежки. Да, это звучит странно, но, поверьте, в этой милоте никакой грязи!

🟢Почти как биржа, но с блестками
Игроки разводят слаймов, выращивают фрукты и торгуют на плорт-маркете. Курсы плортов скачут, как дикие слаймы, так что иногда приходится думать, как в Уолл-стрит (≖‿≖ ) Но не переживайте – здесь никто не кричит про акции, максимум, что услышите – довольное «плюх» или хихиканье от очередного слайма.

🟢Одинокий фермер и секреты прошлого
Сюжет рассказывается через записки бывшего владельца фермы и письма от друга Беатрикс. Эти послания наполняют мир душевностью и легкой грустью. Это как читать дневник милой бабушки, но вместо пирогов – советы, как приручить гигантского слайма.

🟢Геймплей: милота и немного хаоса
Слаймы бывают разные – светящиеся, радиоактивные, золотые. А если их скрестить, можно получить гибриды, но переборщите – и появится злой тарр, уничтожающий все на своем пути. Главное – вовремя кормить питомцев, чтобы они не начинали пускать укоризненные взгляды.

❗️Что можно улучшить?
Конечно, игра местами повторяется: корми, собирай, продавай. Но разве не в этом весь смысл фермерства? Плюс, доступ к некоторым фишкам, вроде порталов, появляется только ближе к концу. Тут начинаешь жалеть, что не вложился в науку раньше – меньше бы мотался туда-сюда.

✅Вывод: милашество на максимум!
Slime Rancher – это идеальный способ отвлечься от реальности и на несколько часов стать космическим фермером. Вас ждут яркие пейзажи, увлекательные исследования и море слаймов, которые в равной степени умиляют и смешат. Ну а если что-то пойдет не так, просто взгляните на их круглые мордашки – и все становится неважно

184883106.review:
39元

輕鬆小品，但是也可以很農很農，畢竟是經營農場遊戲。
但是實際上幾乎都在走路多，有點跟想像中不同，但是還能接受。
有特惠是值得一買，如果你喜歡經營農場外加探索世界類型遊戲。

優點
整體上還不錯，農場經營方式中規中矩的設計。
唯一不同就是史萊姆很可愛，吸引人來玩的原因。
可以自由混種史萊姆，設計相當有趣。

缺點
寶藏球有點難找，有些都放在不可思議的地方，能找到真的純屬巧合。
鑰匙解鎖的大門有些根本沒意義，開門有點被欺騙的心情。
部分大史萊姆的位置也藏的太隱密，能發現真的純屬剛好路過。

結論
後期你能設計成自動化經營農場的話，剩下就是在尋寶了。
比起經營農場來說，個人認為這遊戲比較偏向探險與尋寶，因為大部分時間都在走路與找路。

問題
遊戲時常常發現CPU異常飆高到100，怎樣都降不下來。
如果視窗化加上開啟垂直同步會好一點點，顆粒效果也關掉又可以再降低點。
最終只能壓低到70~90%之間，總覺得好燒CPU的感覺。
但是CUP還是比玩其他遊戲還要高，大致估狗也沒找出個解答出來。
總之就是忍受CPU飆高到80上下的狀況去遊玩。
如果你在此遊戲，記得注意一下你的CPU!?

184877192.review:
🐌 Первое впечатление: "Ой, какие прелестные желешки!"
🎇 Через час: "Почему мой курятник взорвался?!"
💰 Цель всей игры: заработать на какашках.

Slime Rancher – это симулятор жизни на ферме слаймов, где всё выглядит мило и спокойно ровно до тех пор, пока твои подопечные не решат устроить "Восстание желеев".

Каждый день начинается с уверенности: "Сегодня всё будет под контролем". Но заканчивается либо взрывами, либо побегом слаймов, либо тем, что "Варр" превращает твою ферму в чёрно-радужный хаос.

Краткое руководство по выживанию:

Никогда не перекармливай своих слаймов. Сытый слайм – опасный слайм.
Если ты видишь слайма с сияющими глазами, беги. Беги очень быстро.
Не пытайся обнять взрывающегося слайма. Да, они милые. Нет, не стоит.
Моменты, которые сделают ваш день:
✔ Ловля золотого слайма (он появляется редко и исчезает быстрее, чем зарплата).
✔ Выращивание урожая для своих подопечных (и борьба с желанием съесть морковь самому).
✔ Осознание того, что ты теперь официально фермер... какашек.

Моменты, которые сломают вашу душу:

Увидеть, как "Варр" пожирает всех твоих любимчиков.
Понять, что слаймы умнее, чем ты думал: они сбегают, сговариваются и иногда, кажется, смеются над тобой.
Первая потеря курицы. Покойся с миром, Курица №1.
Вывод:
Slime Rancher – это игра, где каждый день напоминает цирковое шоу: ты жонглируешь слаймами, пытаешься спасти ферму и всё равно возвращаешься за ещё одной порцией хаоса. Рекомендую всем, кто готов смеяться и плакать одновременно.

184719309.review:
[h1]Slime Rancher: Очаровательное и расслабляющее приключение в красочном мире[/h1]

[b]Slime Rancher - это приключенческая игра с элементами симулятора, выпущенная в 2017 году. Игра рассказывает о приключениях молодой фермерши Беатрикс ЛёБо в мире, населенном очаровательными и игривыми слаймами.

Сюжет

Беатрикс отправляется на планету Дальний-Дальний Уголок, чтобы стать слаймоводом - фермером, выращивающим слаймов. Слаймы - это желеобразные существа, которые можно собирать и выращивать для получения ресурсов. Беатрикс должна исследовать различные регионы Дальнего-Дальнего Уголка, чтобы найти и собрать новых слаймов, а также построить и улучшить свою ферму.

Геймплей

Slime Rancher - это в первую очередь игра-симулятор. Игроки должны собирать слаймов, кормить их и заботиться о них. Каждый вид слайма имеет уникальные характеристики и потребности. Игроки должны создавать и улучшать загоны для своих слаймов, а также строить различные устройства, такие как хранилища для пищи и переработчики слаймов.

По мере развития игры игроки смогут исследовать новые регионы Дальнего-Дальнего Уголка, каждый из которых предлагает уникальные виды слаймов и экологические проблемы. Игра также включает в себя элементы приключений, поскольку игроки будут открывать секреты планеты и раскрывать ее тайны.

Художественный стиль и музыка

Slime Rancher отличается ярким и красочным художественным стилем, который прекрасно передает очарование и причудливость мира игры. Слаймы невероятно очаровательны, и игроки не смогут устоять перед их игривой натурой. Музыка в игре также прекрасна и прекрасно дополняет атмосферу.

Заключение

Slime Rancher - это очаровательная и расслабляющая игра, которая предлагает уникальное и полезное впечатление. Благодаря своему очаровательному художественному стилю, увлекательному игровому процессу и милым слаймам Slime Rancher является обязательной игрой для поклонников симуляторов и всех, кто ищет беззаботный и приятный игровой опыт.[/b]

I say this game is worth putting a few hours in before deciding if its for you, because I do really like it, but I didn't right away. 184716951.review:
This game looked cute so I bought it on super sale for $2 at the Steam fall sale. 202 hours later...

Relaxing and cozy. Unique premise. Nice music. Plays well on my potato of a laptop as long as I turn the graphics down. 

I am so, so in to ranching these adorable slimes. Now I have multiple save files with different ranch setups (max profitability v. max cuteness) in normal and casual modes, and I can already see myself coming back again to try new setups and tweak my current ones.

So if you like cute and casual, I highly recommend this game. As far as I am concerned, it would have been worth the money even if I paid full price. Now, off I go to wishlist Slime Rancher 2!

冬促17买的，当初7元的时候没捡到，这次稍贵拿下。
小时侯看着别的up主玩 自己很是羡慕，现在有了自己的电脑玩史莱姆 也算是园了儿时梦了。
游戏我给好评。一是儿时的向往；二是它的游戏节奏很轻松，没有强迫你一定要做的任务，在心力交瘁时也能玩上一玩放松放松 解解压；三是它的机制，从无到有 一点一点的打理，虽然有时也会感到很头疼，但总体还是很有成就感的。
前期好奇 哪哪都很新奇，过渡到中后期就有点坐牢了，跟上班一样要去”打卡“，推荐在需要时去N网加点mod，还是挺有帮助的（虽然我没加，但不妨碍它用起来很方便）
游戏的新手指导很拉跨，属于是到游戏末尾可能还有基础操作不知道的地方
虽然这这那那，但不妨碍它是款好游戏，游戏作者也对它投入了很多(可以去看看作者做游戏时的背景，这里就不加赘述了）

184608753.review: What a dangerously cute and addicting game. It was hard for me to get into it at first, but once I discovered you could pop gordos and unlock new areas of the map with slime keys, the rest was history. Although I've completed the storyline along with the rewards program, I still find myself hooked as there's much to decorate on my ranch and many treasure pods to find. My only complaint is that you cannot fully automate your farm! The drones are a pain (you can only place two per section of your ranch) and you still have to manually do labor to keep your slimes happy. The auto feeders just don't cut it. I find myself trying to explore but regularly having to check back in to make sure my slimes are well fed *cough* *cough* quantum *cough*. I feel as though this late in the game it shouldn't be this grindy but oh well. Still a great game!

184554737.review:
To start off, slime rancher has been one of if not THE best game ive ever played, I grew up playing this game for hours on end daily. the amount of hours i have on this game on PS4 is insane.

Every single aspect of this game has you hooked, the story line, the map, and the endless possibilities of things you can do and decorate in the whole world. 

Beatrix's story and how she progresses is amazing, the pure amount of effort put into the lore and story line as you progress through the game is EVIDENT, and very much appreciated.
The map is full of little places you can explore and have fun in, fly around. etc. 
The amount of ways you can decorate your ranch and your ranch expansions completely hooked me, decorating my ranch with gordos and different plants and items kept me entertained for HOURS. 

Absolute peak of a game, would recommend this to ANYONE no matter their taste in games. 10/10.

184528661.review:
Je ne recommande pas Slime Rancher

Alors oui, le jeu a des qualités :

    Une bonne direction artistique (très colorée, efficace pour le feel good).
    Les petits slimes sont très choops.
    Le jeu permet de passer le temps (du moins pendant les 3-4 premières heures de gameplay).
    La découverte des nouveaux biomes encourage l'exploration.

Maintenant, les défauts :

  - Le jeu est beaucoup trop répétitif (c'est simple : après 4 heures de gameplay, on fait juste attendre que les slimes produisent, et voilà).
  - Il manque d'optimisation pour la ferme. Les robots-abeilles sont sympas, mais bien trop limités (il faut les recharger sans arrêt avec de l'eau, et ils ne voyagent pas entre les zones).
  - Le monde, à part les slimes, les légumes et les poulets, est super vide (oui, j'ai mis l'exploration en point positif, mais il s'agit surtout de la première exploration des biomes).
  - Les allers-retours incessants entre les biomes pour ramasser trois bricoles pour des quêtes ou du craft, c'est vraiment agaçant (oui, on débloque des téléporteurs plus tard, mais ils coûtent un prix en matériaux exorbitant ).
  - Les loot boxes éparpillées sur la carte, ouvrables après 5 heures de jeu, sont inutiles :) (la plupart sont des cosmétiques, d'autres donnent des matériaux pas très utiles).

Personnellement, ce jeu ne correspond pas à mes standards, mais je comprends pourquoi certaines personnes l’aiment. Cependant, je pense qu’après 5-10 heures de découverte, le jeu devient vide.

Je ne recommande pas d'acheter ce jeu s'il n'est pas en solde (20 euros ne valent pas le coup). En revanche, s’il est à moins de 5 euros, ça peut valoir le coup, au moins pour 5-10 heures de fun.

Notes perso 4/10 

( je parle pas des DLC car ces juste cosmétique merci )

184344923.review: 初中的时候，看见逆风笑玩了这个游戏，觉得很好玩，但是当时不知道steam是什么，而且加上生活费比较少，所以在自己的低配电脑上下了个盗版的，当时也分不清什么是盗版和正版，当时的电脑玩这个游戏，经常卡顿，但是觉得很开心，玩的上瘾，后来分享给自己的小伙伴，他们却因为是盗版嘲笑，嘲讽我，当时因为这个，确实让自己觉得自卑，到底是该分享还是不分享。前段时间，看见这个游戏有人说打折了，拉起了回忆，便买下来了，自认为和以前一样好玩，甚至玩法更多了，因为今年可能要入伍了，所以想尽量把该玩的玩法都玩了，毕竟八年前的小孩儿，也是坐在电脑前想把所有玩法都玩一边。

184325616.review:
Slime Rancher, görsel olarak renkli ve huzur verici bir atmosfere sahip, rahatlatıcı bir oyun. Özellikle doğa temalı ortamları, yumuşak müzikleri ve tatlı slime türleriyle oyuncuya keyifli bir deneyim sunuyor. Oyunun en güzel yanı, keşfetmeye dayalı yapısıyla kendi çiftliğinizi kurarken aynı zamanda geniş bir dünyayı keşfetme fırsatı vermesi. Slime'ları toplamak, onları beslemek ve biyomlar arasında dolaşmak oldukça eğlenceli ve stres atmak için ideal.

Ancak oyunun hikaye derinliğinin biraz zayıf olduğunu söylemek mümkün. Daha çok keşif ve eğlence odaklı bir yapıya sahip olduğu için hikaye arayan oyuncular için yetersiz kalabilir. Ayrıca, görevlerin bir süre sonra kendini tekrar etmesi, uzun süre oynandığında monotonluk hissi yaratabiliyor. İleri seviyede yeni içeriklerin azalması da bazı oyuncular için sıkıcı bir durum olabilir.

Yine de genel olarak bakıldığında, Slime Rancher’ın sakinleştirici yapısı, doğayla iç içe hissettirmesi ve basit ama tatmin edici oynanışı onu rahatlatıcı oyunlar sevenler için çok özel bir yere koyuyor. Özellikle karmaşık bir şey aramayan, sadece huzurlu bir deneyim yaşamak isteyen oyuncular için birebir.    Tercih Ederim

184222802.review:
An absolutely amazing game! It's both fun and very chill, something to sit down and relax to after an exhausting day, or simply load up whenever you're bored.

The adventure aspect is fun and exciting. I really enjoyed unlocking new areas, collecting new slimes and making new combinations. Not to mention the many secrets to find and unlock. 10/10

The graphics are quite simple yet manages to present beautiful and scenic environments, and most importantly, slimy and bouncy bundles of joy. I really have to emphasize the beautiful and cozy feeling of this game. 9/10

The story is completely optional through text files without voicelines scattered across the world during your adventures, both a plus and a minus of course. This is not a "story game" and therefore I can't give it higher than 5/10

The farming aspect is fun and engaging, with great motivation to earn more Newbucks (Coins) and expand your ranch. The more expensive upgrades are less important for the experience, and serves more as a fun goal to reach, and is balanced out with fun upggrades and other goals to reach alongside. 9/10

With 2 different difficulties and an additional gamemode for speedrunneers, I'd say this game truly is for everyone. Despite being a somewhat picky person, and for what this game is supposed to be, I'd give it a strong 9.5/10

184150448.review:
*Trying this game out*
*20-30 min later* - "Huh, aside from how colorful, cute and charming this game looks, i don't see how this game could keep me interested to play at for hours"
*5 hours later* - "It's 4 am in the morning and i'm still playing, WHY IS THIS GAME SO FUN!?"

This is how i felt on my first day (or night rather) of playing Slime Rancher.

This is one of the first proper Farming Sim games that I've ever played, Slime Rancher gives you enough variety in gameplay to keep you hooked for awhile. 
From managing your ranch of slimes, exploring the beautiful/cute wilds of the "Far Far Range" and Discovering new types of slimes and resources, to trading with other ranchers in the "Ranch exchange" and working for some of them to earn rewards and useful upgrades to your ranch.
It's not a very difficult game, but personally it doesn't have to be, alongside the game's soundtrack it's a pretty relaxing game with funny slime physics.

I personally didn't care much for the story of the game, it's mainly been told through mails that you get and text messages from a certain reoccurring character scattered around the range.

Overall: Slime Rancher was a fun game that I didn't expect myself to get addicted to, and i'll probably come back to try out the Sequel game as well some day. If you haven't tried out a "Farming Sim" game before then this is a good place to start, Just give at an hour or 2 and it may start to click with you. 

[h2] 9/10 [/h2]
would get addicted till early in the morning again.

[h1]Slime Rancher Review – 55 Hours In[/h1]

[b]Rating:[/b] ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

After 55 hours in Slime Rancher, it’s safe to say this game is a delightful, relaxing escape that combines exploration, creativity, and a touch of chaos. Ranching adorable slimes on a mysterious, colorful planet is as fun and rewarding as it sounds, and the game’s charm never wears thin.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Gameplay – Relaxing and Addictive[/h2]
Slime Rancher is all about managing your slime ranch while exploring the vibrant world of the Far, Far Range. The gameplay loop of collecting slimes, feeding them, and selling their plorts to upgrade your ranch is incredibly satisfying.

Each slime type has unique quirks, making discovery and experimentation exciting. Exploring the various biomes reveals hidden secrets, resources, and new slimes to bring back to your ranch. Even after hours of play, there’s always a sense of progression as you expand your ranch and unlock upgrades.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Highlights – What Makes It Shine[/h2]
✔️ Adorable slime designs that bring a smile to your face.
✔️ Vibrant, visually stunning world with lots of secrets to uncover.
✔️ Relaxing gameplay loop that’s easy to pick up but hard to put down.
✔️ Tons of upgrades and customization options for your ranch.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Cons – Small Nitpicks[/h2]
❌ Inventory space feels limited early on.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Final Thoughts – A Wholesome, Joyful Adventure[/h2]
Slime Rancher is an absolute gem for players looking for a relaxing yet engaging experience. Its combination of exploration, ranch management, and the sheer joy of wrangling slimes creates a game that’s hard to put down. Whether you’re in it for the adventure, the creativity, or just to admire the adorable slimes, this game has something for everyone.

[b][u]Recommended[/u][/b] for anyone who loves cozy games with a touch of adventure and endless charm!

[quote=Deelt]If you found this review helpful, please give it a like or an award! Thanks for reading, and happy ranching![/quote]

本次评测分为总结、优点、缺点三个部分进行介绍

总结：
很休闲治愈的史莱姆游戏，如果你最近游戏荒，来体验一下在牧场与软乎乎的史莱姆生活的乐趣也不妨为一个好的选择；

优点：
1、休闲、轻松、治愈。游戏主打的就是一个放松，不需要紧张兮兮的去完成任务，你可以就在牧场里养养鸡，出门找找看今天有没有新的史莱姆出现在周围，带回牧场里进行培育，这就是本作最主要的玩法；
2、对史莱姆的刻画。不管是史莱姆的外形，还是史莱姆弹跳时的音效，游戏中都刻画的非常不错，且游戏中史莱姆的种类很多，玩家能够在其中收获到足够的探索乐趣；

缺点：
1、对主线剧情的表述不明确/不清晰/不明显。玩了5个小时我还是没玩明白这个游戏的主线剧情是需要干什么，每天就是出去找找史莱姆，拿结晶卖金币，金币解锁各种建筑，建筑圈养史莱姆或是培养果实，果实是史莱姆的食物，史莱姆吃了食物之后又产出结晶，结晶又卖金币，金币又....就这么进入一个循环，但一直不明白游戏的主要目的是什么，需要玩家做什么；
2、由于主线剧情不明确，导致我很快就没有了上游戏的欲望，每天进游戏就是循环几件事情，也见不到其他的人类能给你发任务或打招呼，最多就是给你发邮件问候一下，并给你发布一些材料的需求订单，完成订单后能获得金币及其他材料；

184062789.review:
Slime Rancher is undeniably a charming and adorable game, and I can absolutely see why it has captured the hearts of so many players. While it wasn’t a perfect fit for me personally, it’s still a game I’d recommend to anyone looking for a cute, cozy experience with minimal stress.

One of the most delightful aspects of Slime Rancher is its aesthetic. The graphics are vibrant and charming, and the character designs—especially the cat slimes—are irresistibly cute. The main character also adds to the charm, fitting seamlessly into the whimsical world of slime wrangling.

In terms of gameplay, it’s easygoing and straightforward, making it a great pick for players who want to unwind. The story, while simple, is endearing enough to keep players engaged, and the overall price point is reasonable for what the game offers.

That said, it didn’t quite align with my personal preferences. I found that it lacked certain elements I typically look for in a game, and as a result, I don’t see myself returning to it. However, this is purely a matter of taste and shouldn’t detract from the game’s overall appeal.

Slime Rancher is a solid choice for fans of cozy games, and its adorable visuals and laid-back vibe make it worth a try for anyone seeking a lighthearted gaming experience.

183943181.review:
Uma experiência simplesmente INCRÍVEL! Fazia muito tempo desde que um jogo conseguiu me capturar dessa forma, ascendeu aquele antigo desejo de conseguir jogar um jogo por horas e horas sem ficar entediado após 1h de jogatina.

Em Slime Rancher você tem um objetivo muito simples, criar Slimes. Você os alimenta e vende o "Plort" que eles fornecem.
Mas mesmo com uma mecânica tão simples o jogo consegue ter inúmeras camadas de complexidade, pois os Slimes tem inúmeras combinações e a progressão do jogo é bem satisfatória, com várias melhorias para o personagem e para o seu rancho, principalmente quando você consegue melhorias para automatizar a criação dos Slimes.

Este não é um jogo difícil, ele é um jogo tranquilo e relaxante que você vai encontrar poucos desafios no seu caminho. Os inimigos são fáceis e o foco principal está em aproveitar a jornada e aos poucos entender como as mecânicas do jogo funcionam.

Um dos pontos altos no jogo é a sua exploração, pois a cada área temos Slimes e itens novos, o que traz aquele desejo de explorar e conhecer a região. E após capturar os Slimes sempre temos um desafio novo, pois cada Slime age de forma diferente, o que torna a criação deles cada vez mais complexa.

De ponto baixo temos a história, ela existe mais pra dar um contexto de algumas coisas no jogo, eu realmente senti falta de uma narrativa mais envolvente, mesmo que esse não seja o foco deste jogo.
Outro ponto que deixa a desejar é o Grind nos minigames. Os minigames que temos são sim divertidos, mas ter que fazer eles inúmeras vezes se torna chato e repetitivo. As recompensas finais deles são excelentes, mas possivelmente você só acaba desbloqueando elas mais pro final do jogo (após boas horas de repetição), o que deixa elas meio sem sentido ao meu ver...

Enfim, se você está procurando um jogo tranquilo e relaxante, com foco em exploração e na criação de Slimes virtuais, este jogo é pra você!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DICAS DO JOGO, EVITANDO QUE VOCÊ PRECISE ABRIR A WIKI E ESTRAGAR A SUA EXPERIÊNCIA!

- Os Slimes "Gordos" precisam de inúmeras comidas para serem alimentados. É necessário alimentar eles para progredir no jogo e ter acesso a novas áreas;

- Ao fazer as missões do jogo, foque nestes 3 personagens: Viktor, Ogden e Mochi, pois eles são os únicos que fornecem missões adicionais. Principalmente o Viktor, pois as recompensas facilitam a automatização do Rancho;

- Não existe o "layout perfeito" do rancho ou a "combinação perfeita" dos Slimes, experiente diferentes combinações e se divirta!

183903746.review:
Rezension: Slime Rancher

Slime Rancher, entwickelt von Monomi Park, ist ein charmantes und einzigartiges Spiel, das die Spieler in die Rolle von Beatrix LeBeau versetzt, einer jungen Farmerin auf einem fernen Planeten. Ihre Aufgabe ist es, eine Ranch zu betreiben, indem sie die niedlichen, aber manchmal chaotischen Slimes einfängt, füttert und verwaltet. Das Spiel kombiniert Farming-Simulation, Abenteuer und Erkundung mit einem Prize Chaos und unaufhörlichem Charme.

Story und Konzept:
Die Story von Slime Rancher ist einfach, aber einladend: Beatrix begibt sich auf ein intergalaktisches Abenteuer, um eine erfolgreiche Slime-Ranch aufzubauen. Während die Handlung nicht im Vordergrund steht, gibt es durch gelegentliche Nachrichten und Artefakte kleine Einblicke in die Weltgeschichte und Beatrix' Beweggründe. Die narrative Zurückhaltung erlaubt es den Spielern, sich ganz auf die kreative Freiheit und das Gameplay zu konzentrieren.

Das Konzept ist so einfach wie genial: Slimes verschiedener Arten werden auf der Ranch gepflegt, ihre Hinterlassenschaften gesammelt und verkauft, um Upgrades und neue Ausrüstung zu finanzieren. Die Mischung aus Entspannung und Management macht den Kern des Spiels aus.

Spielablauf
Der Spielablauf ist ein perfektes Guthaben aus Sammeln, Erkunden und Optimieren. Beatrix nutzt ihren Vacpack, eine Art Multifunktions-Waffe, um Slimes einzusammeln, Ressourcen zu ernten und sogar Hindernisse aus dem Weg zu räumen. Die Slimes selbst sind das Herzstück des Spiels: Sie haben verschiedene Eigenschaften, Verhaltensweisen und Bedürfnisse, die man berücksichtigen muss.

Die Ranch kann nach und nach erweitert werden, um mehr Gehege, Farmen und Lagerplätze zu schaffen. Besonders reizvoll ist das Experimentieren mit Hybrid-Slimes (sogenannte Largos), die aus der Kombination zweier Arten entstehen. Doch Vorsicht: Unvorsichtiger Umgang kann schnell zu Tarr-Slimes führen, das Chaos auf der Ranch verbreiten.

Die Welt, der Far Range, ist in verschiedene Biome unterteilt, die es zu erkunden gilt. Jedes Gebiet bietet neue Ressourcen, Geheimnisse und Slime-Arten. Die Aufklärung fühlt sich stets lohnend an, auch wenn die Gebiete irgendwann bekannt werden.

Grafik und Sound
Die Grafik von Slime Rancher ist farbenfroh, stilisiert und absolut bezaubernd. Die Slimes sind lebendig animiert und haben eine enorme Persönlichkeit, die sie schnell wie Haustiere wirken lässt. Die Umgebungen sind vielfältig gestaltet und bieten eine gute Balance zwischen Natürlichkeit und Fantasie.

Der Soundtrack ist angenehm und entspannt, unterstreicht das gemütliche Gefühl des Spiels und bleibt angenehm im Hintergrund. Die Geräusche der Slimes – vom fröhlichen „Plop“ bis zu den bedrohlichen Klängen der Tarrs – sind perfekt auf die jeweiligen Situationen abgestimmt.

Technische Umsetzung
Slime Rancher läuft stabil und ist technisch ausgereift. Bugs sind selten, und die Steuerung ist intuitiv und leicht zugänglich. Besonders für Spieler, die neu im Genre sind, ist die Lernkurve flach angenehm.

Fazit:
Slime Rancher ist ein herzerwärmendes Spiel, das mit seiner Mischung aus entspannter Simulation, cleverem Ressourcenmanagement und niedlicher Ästhetik begeistert. Die niedlichen Slimes und die Freiheit, die Ranch nach eigenem Belieben zu gestalten, machen es zu einer idealen Wahl für alle, die eine entspannte, aber fesselnde Spielerfahrung suchen.

Auch wenn das Spiel nach einigen Stunden repetitive Züge annehmen kann und größere Herausforderungen fehlen, wird es durch seine charmante Präsentation und das fesselnde Gameplay leicht ausgeglichen.

Bewertung : 9/10
Empfohlen für Fans von: Stardew Valley, My Time at Portia und Animal Crossing.

183878449.review:
On the surface, this looks like a farming simulator where you capture and raise adorable slime babies. It is visually stunning and chaotic, and the world-building is top-notch. Every time you discover a new slime or area is exciting, and there's just so much to do in the game that hours will pass before you even notice it.

... but do NOT sleep on the message nodes and storyline! Playing through and streaming the game led to a deep conversation that brought my Twitch chat and I to tears - something we were not expecting from a wholesome game about cute, bouncy slimes. The writing in this game is engaging and humourous, and makes reading through even the Slimepedia enjoyable. 

This game is worth every dollar, and is a STEAL when it is on sale. I did get quite motion sick when I first played it though, so do lower your mouse sensitivity if you are prone to that. ^^"

Can't wait to play SR2! <3

183715119.review:
[h1]Slime Rancher: The Game That Lied to Me[/h1]
[h3]There was no tutorial on how to make slime without borax. Worst game ever.[/h3]

I went into Slime Rancher expecting a wholesome game about making slime like those YouTube tutorials. You know, the satisfying gooey stuff you can stretch, poke, and glitterfy? But no, instead of teaching me how to make slime without borax, this game throws me into a ranch with blobs that bounce, eat chickens, and somehow poop money.

The graphics are too cute. I was emotionally unprepared for the plort economy. I spent [b]hours[/b] vacuuming these creatures, only to realize I’m just an unpaid slime janitor with a giant debt. Capitalism wins again.

[h3]Final verdict:[/h3]

0/10 for not teaching me how to make slime at home without borax.
100/10 for emotional damage and accidentally making me love pink blobs of doom.

Would I recommend it? Absolutely. Just don’t expect glitter or ASMR poking sounds.

183697130.review:
2 dolara alıp 15-20 saat geçirmek, bence parasına değer. O açıdan bakarsak bence alıp oynanabilecek bir oyun. Ve ben de 15. saatime kadar nefessiz oynayarak zamanımı geçirdim o konuda da hakkını vermem lazım. Ancak 15. saatte oyundan çıktım, yarın girerim dedim ve bir sonraki girişimde tüm oynama isteğim yok oldu. Bence oyundaki son adaya geldiğinizde ve tarlanızı dronelarla yönetmeye başladığınızda oyunun albenisi yavaştan gitmiş oluyor ve tekrara bağlıyor. Kalan kısım sadece içeriği %100lemek için bir grinda dönüşüyor. Bunu fark edince devam edesim gelmedi ve bıraktım. Zaten bunları yapmadan da bitiş sinematiğine gelebiliyorsunuz ama muhtemelen hikayesi için oynamayacaksınız bu oyunu, yani pek de bitirmiş sayılmıyorsunuz bence.

 Sonlarda oyundan bıkmamın birkaç nedeni var. Birincisi tarlayı tamamen otomatik yapamıyorsunuz, yine sizin düzenli olarak müdahale etmeniz gerekiyor ve bu bıktırıyor. İkincisi ev upgradelerini almanın özellikle 10. seviyeden sonra kozmetik dışı çok nadir geri bildirimi oluyor ve taa 20. seviyeye gelene kadar pek de işe yarar şeyler vermiyorlar. O seviyeye gelmek de çok uzun bir para grindına dönüyor. Üçüncüsü level dizaynı çok karışık ve harita da yardımcı olmuyor. İlk dolaştığınızda yol bulmak iyi bir oynanış öğesi gibi gelse de her işiniz düştüğünde yeniden nereye nerden gidildiğini hatırlamaya çalışmak eğlenceli değil. Ayrıca fast travel çok kısıtlı yani bu duruma özellikle oyunun ilerleyen bölümlerinde çok maruz kalınıyor. Ana adayı bitirdim ama ikinci adayı açınca aynı şeylerle yeniden uğraşmak istemedim. Orayı rushlayarak geçtim. Bir de görev yaparak evine gittiğiniz karakterlerin adaları vs. var onlara da sadece giriş yapıp bıraktım çünkü zaten sonlardaydım ve daha fazla içerik istemiyordum.

Tabi yine de oyun bu noktaya gelene kadar güzel. Bunun sebepleri oyunun başında gerçekten aciz bir durumda başlıyor olmanız ve oyunun simüle ettiği piyasada ilk satışınızı gerçekleştirdiğiniz anda, sattığınız ürünün birim fiyatının yere çakılması sonucu yediğiniz jumpscare ve bu engeli aşma isteğiniz. Karaktere bir çok özellik kazandırabiliyoruz, tarlada slime kafeslerini türlü türlü upgradelerle geliştirebiliyoruz, ekonomiyi öğrenip piyasadaki fiyat değişimine adapte olmayı öğrenebiliyoruz ve bunlarla uğraşmak bir öğrenme süreci gerektirse de zor da olmadığı için eğlenceli oluyor. Ama drone alma aşamasına geldiğinizde bu 3 durumda da hemen hemen tüm gelişmeniz bittiği için eğlence de bitmeye başlıyor. Aslında ben research stationu açtığımızda gidip şurada şunu kazayım şurdan şunu toplayayım da makine yapayım kısımlarına da çok hoş bakmamıştım ama onlara da sonradan alışılabiliyor.

Yine de benim sözüme o kadar takılmayın. Belki de siz 20. saatten sonra da sıkılmayacaksınız bilemem. Bence eğlencesi kaçıyor ancak seveni de olabilir. İncelemelerde uzun saatler oynayanları da göreceksinizdir. Zaten 2 dolar olduğu için alın deneyin derim minimum 15 saat akıyor sonuçta.

6.5/10

183628652.review:
### Overview

You hang out with a bunch of slimey jigglies as you try to create a farm out of their poo-i mean plorts. There is alot of exploring to try to fill out the slimepedia, and a little bit of story sprinkled throughout the whole playable area. Lots to discover, lots to do, and so much to HOARD LOOOOL those silos….

### Gameplay

- You control a vacuum gun where you can suck in things into your inventory—that same gun can also be used to shoot out the stuff that you have in your inventory. It’s in first person and there is a jetpack mechanic that lets you glide around. Super fun.
- I was hooked on managing a plort farm—at first to make some money, but eventually to make the science gadgets. Then I got really into making sure I had plorts from every single kind of slime and also hoarded a ton of plorts that I could have sold for more newbucks.
- I really enjoyed the variety of all of the food, chickens, slimes— even the rewards club customizations, there is so much stuff that you still manage to discover late in the game. Lots of customization in a way that seems overwhelming until you realize that you have no room and have to make tough decisions LOL! The whole keeping slimes as pets idea is really so cute and unique.

### Graphics & Art Style

- All of the areas looked so well thought out, on theme, and really beautiful and vivid to look at. It felt cartoon-y but in a realistic way—since there is no way slimes should exist like this IRL anyway and prob would not look as cute.
- It really got me to want to explore and go off the beaten path. So many times I thought something was a dead end, only to find out that if I had looked a little harder there was a ledge that would lead me into this underground area. So cool.

### Sound & Music

- I noticed myself bopping to the music, and I found that the music in the Glass Desert was really chilling and grated on my vibes. That place is a trip. It never felt repetitive while I was spending HOURS on the farm hoarding everything.
- Every sound effect that the slimes made, everything really just felt so alive and real because everything had a noise. If I hit the plort on something that wasnt in the middle of the machine it would make a different sound. Just these subtle things.

### Performance

- On my PC with slightly old as fck parts, it ran smoothly, although i would hear the computer whirr loudly sometimes, but rarely. It’s prob because of my millions of plorts I had lmao. On the steam deck, it would make the steam deck really hot so I didn’t play it that much.
- The game is really simple and the developers really put a lot of effort into making a great and solid game.

### Overall Impressions

- *What did you like most?* I liked all of the variety of everything, slimes, food, resources, decorations, like there was SO MUCH STUFF!!!
- *What didn’t work well?* I feel like there was a story but to me it was hard to feel invested in reading a couple of letters and logs scattered throughout the world. The game felt like it ended abruptly while I was gathering resources lmao it made me go HUH when it jumped to credits.
- *Would you recommend it?* If someone was looking for a great farming sim type of game, yes I would recommend it. They would have a great time managing and getting lost in the world.

---

**Final Score:** 4.75/5 only because I have to save the 5s for like truly 5s.

183517038.review:
As someone who is not the biggest fan of farming games, I was definitely surprised to enjoy this game as much as I do. The world is sprawling with a variety of areas equipped with unique music, plants, atmosphere, and slimes! The areas are just large enough that it satiates the desire to explore, but it's not overwhelming or daunting. Having to tend to the specific needs of every slime keeps the simple farming system interesting. Not to mention, having to work towards the benefits of the minigames and 7Zee rewards club keeps me motivated to play.

Overall: Little to no story. Plenty of exploration. Self-paced, so there's no real goals. There is not much replay value once you unlock all the areas, but improving your ranch is always an option. I would recommend for all gamers looking for a beautiful, relaxing game.

183504890.review:
前言:
Istant Gaming上打折买的结果直接Steam秋促直接被刺我QAQ........
---------------------------------------------------------
这是一款整体表现非常优秀，体量中等的游戏，其画风和游戏模式都充满了创意和趣味性。无论你是喜欢悠闲经营还是热衷冒险探索，这款游戏都能带来与众不同的体验。游戏采用了明亮而柔和的卡通画风，色彩搭配非常鲜艳，每一只史莱姆都设计得极为可爱，从圆滚滚的外形到各种独特的表情，萌到让人忍不住想把它们全都收入囊中。

玩法方面还算灵活，你可以选择安心待在农场里专注于黏液养殖和资源收集，经营自己的黏液帝国——这一模式适合喜欢轻松和规划的玩家。而如果你渴望刺激，也可以踏出农场，前往那些充满未知和危险的区域展开冒险。

在冒险模式中，探索新区域的过程充满了惊喜。你会遇到不同类型的黏液怪、收集稀有资源，甚至解锁一些隐藏的秘密。这种玩法的多样性使游戏既可以满足慢节奏的治愈需求，又可以提供令人上瘾的探索乐趣。

缺点是体量并没有那么大，可能在后期对部分玩家会显现单调感，特别是在农场经营模式中，资源管理和黏液养殖的循环性玩法可能略显单调。之后我打折的时候我大概率也会买第二部。

总体而言这是一款我个人十分推荐的神作，冬促的时候可以无脑入库。
